ygData.subject: It was worth a try
ygData.msgSnippet: The Autoguns swung around to face Lady Hawk, they weren t firing so she must have done something right. She stared at the scanner trying to piece together her

The Autoguns swung around to face Lady Hawk, they weren't firing so she must
have done something right. She stared at the scanner trying to piece
together her mistake. She thought hard for a few moments before the
realization hit her. she'd stayed in her half organic mode so the scanners
picked up her as well as Devilduer. "Well if thats the way you want to play
this game I can play too." if the guns were to fire she'd be ready.

Battera's cold greeting caught Lady Hawk off gaurd. a quick relapse of the
battle helped her a little. "I am Lady Hawk, daughter of Veratis and member
of the royal family of Avaria. and I find it to be an insult to have your
guns facing me.


----- Original Message -----
From: <Yanshosh@...>
To: <nbwrpg@egroups.com>
Sent: Wednesday, October 04, 2000 7:11 AM
Subject: Alliance Base


> ::Zardus/Dark One/Alliance Base::
>
> Zardus looks from Battera to Dark One, who had just come up to him,
carrying
> Squizzy. His wrist comp beeps a bit, reporting a bot near the door. He
taps a
> few keys to stop the autoguns from opening fire.
>
> "There's a bot near the entrance," he says to Battera, "Can you show her
in,
> ask her what she wants, and make sure she doesn't go loose in the base? I
> have to attend to this bot."
>
> He takes Squizzy from Dark One, walking off toward the lab.
> ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
> The Alliance base's autoguns recognize DevilDuer's DNA, but also recognize
> Lady Hawk's. The doors stay closed, the autoguns aiming at Lady Hawk,
ready
> to fire just in case.
>
>
>
